file_content.text: PLACEHOLDER: Bark indicating that you cannot turn in/start Balmorra/Nar Shaddaa.
Welcome to Balmorra, hunter. Your target is the right impressive Admiral Ivernus, they call him "Admiral Untouchable."
Spends all his time on a fancy flagship surrounded by armed soldiers.
Can't kill what you can't touch, hunter. You gotta lure Admiral Ivernus off his flyin' fortress and down to Balmorra.
To make things even more interestin', no friendly contacts here. You gotta figure this out yourself.
And don't forget--the job ain't done 'til you're the only hunter left standin'. Good luck!
Mako, get me everything you can find on Admiral Ivernus.
We need information.
Already on it. Logging in to the Imperial network now....
Don't need it, Crysta.
That's what I like most about you.
She's kidding, right? This is a suicide mission.
Was that a joke?
Never stopped you before. Consider this a chance to show you've got more in your arsenal than a blaster.
I'm logging into the Imperial network. Let's see what I can dig up about this Admiral Ivernus....
He's a war hero, all right. Actually won some battles against the Mandalorians. Wonder if that's how he got on the list?
Hmm, this is interesting. Turns out, one of the admiral's toadies is in the market for a bounty hunter.
Let's get every piece of information on them you can pull down.
That's our in. We got a name?
What's the job this toadie wants done?
Details?
There's nothing specific, but it's a high priority encoded message. Only top bounty hunters can access it--I had to hack it.
You sure this is solid?
You get rid of people's problems. I find out what they are.
The job listing contact is Lieutenant Major Pirrell. And get this--"discretion is of the utmost importance." Whatever this is, Pirrell wants it secret.
Let's apply for a job and see if we can't work our way up to the admiral.
It's a start.
Lieutenant Major Pirrell's office is at the Imperial base in Sobrik. Let's go impress him and see where it leads.
How does this secret job help us?
Think we should follow up?
It's all I've got. Better than nothing, right?
Imperials have the best dirty little secrets. Remember Dromund Kaas?
If nothing else, it'll be fun.
Dirty is right. I don't think I'll ever forget that poor admiral and his horrible daughter.
How 'bout we go have a chat with Lieutenant Major Pirrell at his office at the Imperial base in Sobrik--find out what he wants?
You notice the Great Hunt never sends us anywhere nice?
The Empire's been fighting for control of Balmorra for years. Death toll's in the high seven figures.
War or no war, I've got a job to do.
Doesn't matter.
I'm really starting to admire this professional attitude of yours.
How is there anything left to fight over?
That's a lot of war.
The weapons factories are built to withstand attack. The people aren't.
Guess that death toll isn't high enough, if they're still fighting.
Must still be resistance.
The resistance fighters have a lot of support. Rumor is, the Republic never really left.
Let's see what Crysta has to say about our job here. Starting the holo now....
